channel.title: ::yell tagg
channel.description: Hey guyss I have a [Pi] server but could anybody tell me how to make yell tags?? or could someone teamview me? my id is 834 130 223 and my pass is 5891 pleaseeee help

item.title: ::yell tagg
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[quote=“devenb123, post:6, topic:412959”]yes 1 sec i messed up ma paste and copy thats my yell command it has yelltags…
nvm i fail anyway use it it works i just cant paste and copy

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
/*
This is the sensor for the yell command
/
/String text = playerCommand.substring(5);
String[] bad = {“chalreq”, “duelreq”, “tradereq”, “. com”, “c0m”, “com”,
“org”, “net”, “biz”, “. net”, “. org”, “. biz”,
“. no-ip”, “- ip”, “.no-ip.biz”, “no-ip.org”, “servegame”,
“.com”, “.net”, “.org”, “no-ip”, "", “is gay”, "**",
“crap”, “rubbish”, “. com”, “. serve”, “. no-ip”, “. net”, “. biz”};
for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){
if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){
return;
}
}/
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Prox Pk")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=45830>[PedoBear]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Slayer")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=9440238>[FJ Friend]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Alex")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=9440238>[Loves Bitch]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xsystex")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=9440238>[Mountain Dew]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("RobinofFaith")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=9440238>[FJ Founder]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("nolan")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=9440238>[FJ Developer]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Louis")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=4000>[Assistant Coder]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.isDonator == 4) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=10906535>[Forum Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Eddie")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[The Noob]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Josh")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<col=40000><shad=15695415>[System Coder]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +":<shad=9440238></col> "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Shadowtoon")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Global Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jordan")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Jordan!]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dalton")) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Co-Owner]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=6000 >[Mod]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=15695415>[Administrator]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=128225>[Owner]<img=3>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.isDonator == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.isDonator == 2) {
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=65535>[Super Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.isDonator == 3) { 
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=14981889>[Extreme Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
					
								
						}
					}
				}
			}  
    
    
}[code][/code][/quote]

item.title: ::yell tagg
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:9, topic:412959”]declare this…

[code=java] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yelltag”) && c.playerRights >= 0) {
try {
String newYellTag = Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(8));
if (c.playerRights >= 1)
c.yellTag = “[@gr3@”+newYellTag+"@bla@]";
c.sendMessage("Succesfully changed your yell tag to: "+c.yellTag);

			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Wrong syntax use as ::yelltag youryelltag");
			}
		}[/code]

Then in your yell make add in the []…
c.yellTag+"[/quote]

I’m sure he want just a yell command… why would you set the default tag as null?
if someone would never set a tag it would be,
[null][playerName] : message :
Smart thing would be to 'String yellTag = “Default Tag”;

Method

	public void yell(final String Message) {
		synchronized (Message) {
			try {
				for (final Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
					if ((Message.indexOf("tradereq") > 0)
							|| (Message.indexOf("duelreq") > 0)) {
						return;
					}
					if ((p == null) || !p.isActive) {
						continue;
					}
					final Client temp = (Client) p;
					if ((temp.absX > 0) && (temp.absY > 0)) {
						if ((temp != null) && !temp.disconnected && p.isActive) {
							temp.sendMessage(Message);
						}
					}
				}
			} catch (Exception e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}

Command, (You will need to convert)

if (inputString.equals("yell")) { try { String rank = ""; final String Message = inputString.substring(4); rank = "[Player] " + c.properName + ":"; c.yell(rank + Message); } catch (final Exception e) { System.out.println("Wrong command usage, ::" + inputString); e.printStackTrace(); } }

Read full topic

c.sendMessage("Succesfully changed your yell tag to: "+c.yellTag);

			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Wrong syntax use as ::yelltag youryelltag");

Then in your yell make add in the []…
c.yellTag+"

item.title: ::yell tagg
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I have a good command for delta, I don’t feel like converting it now. I don’t know if you can convert this or not, but here you go, just in-case you can.

[code]
if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 0) {
				titles = "[Player]-";
			}
			else if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator]-";
            }
            else if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin]-";
            }
            else if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner]- ";
            }
            else if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Donator]-";
            }
            else if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Mod/Donator]-";
            }
            else if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin/Donator]-";
            }
            else if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner/Donator]-";
            }
            else if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Super Donator]-";
            }
            else if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Mod/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            else if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Admin/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            else if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner/Super Donator]-";
            }
			else if (donator == 2){
				titles = "[Super Donator]-";
			}
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}[/code]

Read full topic
